title: New: OKBADLANDS – Dust & Gold
body:
This latest track from Brisbane duo **OKBADLANDS** (Kate Gurren and Sally Latter) has some of my favourite production I’ve heard in quite some time.

Teaming up with fellow Aussie Golden Vessel (Max Byrne), it’s a brilliantly glittering slice of twisted electro-pop, managing to be both effortlessly ‘cool’ and desperately emotionally. Check out _Dust & Gold_ below.

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
